00085 SBW_API void SBWObject::Release()
00086 {
00087         assert(numberOfReferences > 0);
00088 
00089         numberOfReferences-- ;
00090 
00091         if (numberOfReferences == 0)
00092                 delete this ;
00093 }

00101 SBW_API void SBWObject::AddReference()
00102 {
00103         assert(numberOfReferences >= 0);
00104 
00105         numberOfReferences++ ;
00106 }
